name: Amir Taaki
description:
- Bitcoin dev 2010-2015
- 20+ years free software dev
- Created DarkFi
- Created BIP 0001
- Founded first UK Bitcoin exchange
- 10+ years privacy tech (first CoinJoin and stealth addr impl)
- Founded DarkWallet with Vitalik and Cody Wilson
- Fought ISIS in Syria
- Anonymous cryptography and mathematics (homology, algebra, geometry).
- DarkFi = L1 for anonymous on-chain apps: world's first fully anon DAO, world's most anon p2p chat, and anonymous trustless cross-chain swaps.
